Product Name: Born Mens Crown Chino Black - 13 D(M) US

Reviews.text: I wear sandals practically all summer from Memorial day thru the end of September and have for years. I am very particular about the style and fit and finish of what I wear and that it stands up to the streets of NYC where I live as well as travel. These were a disappointment as they were somewhat clunky, were not really my style and were not comfortable for walking any great length despite repeated attempts...a miss.
Reviews.title: otherwise
